description: Demolition of existing single storey ground floor rear extension and erection of single storey ground floor rear extension. New side window to flank wall. Replace front door with new door.
decision_conditions: <p><span data-sheets-value="{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:&quot;The window(s) (         ) in the (          ) wall(s) of the building shall be permanently glazed in obscured glass and kept fixed shut.&quot;}" data-sheets-userformat="{&quot;2&quot;:14787,&quot;3&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:1},&quot;4&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:65280},&quot;9&quot;:0,&quot;10&quot;:0,&quot;11&quot;:4,&quot;14&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:3,&quot;3&quot;:1},&quot;15&quot;:&quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;16&quot;:12}" style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial;">The living room window in the ground floor south side of the building shall be permanently glazed in obscured glass and kept fixed shut.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span data-sheets-value="{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:&quot;The window(s) (         ) in the (          ) wall(s) of the building shall be permanently glazed in obscured glass and kept fixed shut.&quot;}" data-sheets-userformat="{&quot;2&quot;:14787,&quot;3&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:1},&quot;4&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:65280},&quot;9&quot;:0,&quot;10&quot;:0,&quot;11&quot;:4,&quot;14&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:3,&quot;3&quot;:1},&quot;15&quot;:&quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;16&quot;:12}" style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial;">Reason:To</span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 12pt; white-space: pre-wrap;"> <span style="font-size: 14px;">ensure that occupiers</span> </span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 14px; white-space: pre-wrap;">do not suffer a </span><span style="font-family: Arial;">a loss of privacy&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p><p><br></p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.
